panels.description: Total number of virtual machines excluding Pending and Stopped states
panels.title: Running VM Count

panels.description: Number of virtual machines currently in migration state
panels.title: Migrating VMs

panels.description: Total CPU cores allocated to running virtual machines
panels.title: CPU Count for active VMs

panels.description: Total memory allocated to running VMs including runtime overhead and migration overhead

targets.expr:
avg (
  sum by(pod) (
    (
      d8_virtualization_virtualmachine_configuration_memory_size_bytes{namespace=~"$namespace"}
      +
      d8_virtualization_virtualmachine_configuration_memory_runtime_overhead_bytes
    )
    # VM during migration eats x2 RAM
    *
    on(namespace, pod, name)
    (
      1 + (d8_virtualization_virtualmachine_status_phase{phase="Migrating"})
    )
    # Stopped VM do not eats RAM
    *
    on(namespace, pod, name)
    (
      1 - (d8_virtualization_virtualmachine_status_phase{phase="Stopped"})
    )
    # Pending VM do not eats RAM
    *
    on(namespace, pod, name)
    (
      1 - (d8_virtualization_virtualmachine_status_phase{phase="Pending"})
    )
  )
)

panels.title: Memory allocated for running VMs

panels.description: Total storage capacity allocated to virtual disks
panels.title: Storage allocated

panels.description: Summary table showing VM metrics, resource usage, and service counts per namespace

targets.expr:
avg by(namespace) (
  sum by(namespace, pod) (
    (
      d8_virtualization_virtualmachine_configuration_memory_size_bytes{namespace=~"$namespace"}
      +
      d8_virtualization_virtualmachine_configuration_memory_runtime_overhead_bytes
    )
    # VM during migration eats x2 RAM
    *
    on(namespace, pod, name)
    (
      1 + (d8_virtualization_virtualmachine_status_phase{phase="Migrating"})
    )
    # Stopped VM do not eats RAM
    *
    on(namespace, pod, name)
    (
      1 - (d8_virtualization_virtualmachine_status_phase{phase="Stopped"})
    )
    # Pending VM do not eats RAM
    *
    on(namespace, pod, name)
    (
      1 - (d8_virtualization_virtualmachine_status_phase{phase="Pending"})
    )
  )
)

panels.description: CPU quota utilization percentage per namespace (used vs hard limit)

targets.expr:
(  
    sum by (namespace) (kube_resourcequota{namespace=~"$namespace", resource="requests.cpu", type="used"})
)
/
( 
    sum by (namespace) (kube_resourcequota{namespace=~"$namespace", resource="requests.cpu", type="hard"} / 100)
)

panels.description: Total memory allocated to VMs per namespace including overhead over time

targets.expr:
avg by(namespace) (
  sum by(namespace, pod) (
    (
      d8_virtualization_virtualmachine_configuration_memory_size_bytes{namespace=~"$namespace"}
      +
      d8_virtualization_virtualmachine_configuration_memory_runtime_overhead_bytes
    )
    # VM during migration eats x2 RAM
    *
    on(namespace, pod, name)
    (
    1 + (d8_virtualization_virtualmachine_status_phase{phase="Migrating"})
    )
    # Stopped VM do not eats RAM
    *
    on(namespace, pod, name)
    (
    1 - (d8_virtualization_virtualmachine_status_phase{phase="Stopped"})
    )
    # Pending VM do not eats RAM
    *
    on(namespace, pod, name)
    (
    1 - (d8_virtualization_virtualmachine_status_phase{phase="Pending"})
    )
  )
)

avg (
  sum by(pod) (
    (
      d8_virtualization_virtualmachine_configuration_memory_size_bytes{namespace=~"$namespace"}
      +
      d8_virtualization_virtualmachine_configuration_memory_runtime_overhead_bytes
    )
    # VM during migration eats x2 RAM
    *
    on(namespace, pod, name)
    (
      1 + (d8_virtualization_virtualmachine_status_phase{phase="Migrating"})
    )
    # Stopped VM do not eats RAM
    *
    on(namespace, pod, name)
    (
      1 - (d8_virtualization_virtualmachine_status_phase{phase="Stopped"})
    )
    *
    on(namespace, pod, name)
    (
      1 - (d8_virtualization_virtualmachine_status_phase{phase="Pending"})
    )
  )
)

panels.title: Memory usage total

panels.description: Actual memory usage percentage relative to requested memory resources per namespace

targets.expr:
sum by (namespace) (
    d8_virtualization_virtualmachine_os_memory_total_bytes{namespace=~"$namespace"} 
    - 
    d8_virtualization_virtualmachine_os_memory_free_bytes
)
/
(
    avg by (namespace) (
        sum by (pod, namespace) (
            d8_virtualization_virtualmachine_configuration_memory_size_bytes
            # VM during migration eats x2 RAM
            *
            on(namespace, pod, name)
            (
            1 + (d8_virtualization_virtualmachine_status_phase{phase="Migrating"})
            )
            # Stopped VM do not eats RAM
            *
            on(namespace, pod, name)
            (
            1 - (d8_virtualization_virtualmachine_status_phase{phase="Stopped"})
            )
            # Pending VM do not eats RAM
            *
            on(namespace, pod, name)
            (
            1 - (d8_virtualization_virtualmachine_status_phase{phase="Pending"})
            )
        )
    ) / 100
)

panels.description: DVCR storage metrics: provisioned capacity, total capacity, and used space

targets.expr:
sum(max by (persistentvolumeclaim) (
  max by (namespace, persistentvolumeclaim) (
    max by (namespace, persistentvolumeclaim, pod) (
      max_over_time(kube_pod_spec_volumes_persistentvolumeclaims_info{namespace="d8-virtualization"}[$__range])
    ) 
    * on (namespace, pod) group_left(controller)
    max(kube_controller_pod{namespace="d8-virtualization"}) by(namespace, pod)
  )
)
* on (persistentvolumeclaim) group_right()
max by (persistentvolumeclaim) (
  max_over_time(kube_persistentvolume_capacity_bytes[$__rate_interval]) 
  * on (persistentvolume) group_right() 
  (
    label_replace(
      max_over_time(kube_persistentvolumeclaim_info{namespace="d8-virtualization", persistentvolumeclaim=~"dvcr"}[$__rate_interval]),
      "persistentvolume", "$1", "volumename", "(.*)")
  )
))
